mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Project ( name, description, start_date, end_date, github_repo_url, daily_report_time, status ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{description}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{githubRepoUrl}, #{dailyReportTime}, 'ACTIVE' )

INSERT INTO ProjectMember (project_id, user_id, role, status, joined_at) VALUES
(#{m.projectId}, #{m.userId}, #{m.role}, #{m.status}, #{m.joinedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE Project SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, github_repo_url = #{githubRepoUrl}, end_date = #{endDate}, daily_report_time = #{dailyReportTime}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND deleted_at IS NULL AND status = 'ACTIVE'
UPDATE Project SET status = #{status}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE Project SET deleted_at = #{deletedAt}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT p.project_id, p.name, p.description, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.github_repo_url, p.daily_report_time, p.status, pm.is_favorite AS favorite (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ProjectMember sub_pm WHERE sub_pm.project_id = p.project_id AND sub_pm.deleted_at IS NULL AND sub_pm.status != 'INVITED') AS memberCount FROM Project p INNER JOIN ProjectMember pm ON p.project_id = pm.project_id WHERE pm.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 'ACTIVE' AND p.deleted_at IS NULL AND pm.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY p.project_id DESC

SELECT p.project_id, p.name, p.description, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.github_repo_url, p.daily_report_time, p.status, p.updated_at, pm.is_favorite AS isFavorite, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ProjectMember sub_pm WHERE sub_pm.project_id = p.project_id AND sub_pm.deleted_at IS NULL AND sub_pm.status != 'INVITED') AS memberCount FROM Project p INNER JOIN ProjectMember pm ON p.project_id = pm.project_id WHERE pm.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 'DONE' AND p.deleted_at IS NULL AND pm.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY p.end_date DESC

SELECT p.project_id, p.name, p.description, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.status, p.deleted_at, pm.is_favorite AS isFavorite, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ProjectMember sub_pm WHERE sub_pm.project_id = p.project_id AND sub_pm.deleted_at IS NULL AND sub_pm.status != 'INVITED') AS memberCount FROM Project p INNER JOIN ProjectMember pm ON p.project_id = pm.project_id WHERE pm.user_id = #{userId} AND p.deleted_at IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.deleted_at DESC
SELECT project_id, name, deleted_at FROM Project WHERE project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT p.project_id AS projectId, p.name, p.status, p.start_date AS startDate, p.end_date AS endDate, pm.is_favorite AS favorite, -- 총 업무 수 집계 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Task t WHERE t.project_id = p.project_id AND t.deleted_at IS NULL) AS totalTaskCount, -- 완료된 업무 수 집계 (status = 'DONE') (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Task t WHERE t.project_id = p.project_id AND t.status = 'DONE' AND t.deleted_at IS NULL) AS completedTaskCount, -- 완료되지 않은 이슈 수 집계 (status != 'DONE') (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Issue i WHERE i.project_id = p.project_id AND i.status != 'DONE') AS openIssueCount, -- 참여 멤버 수 집계 (활성 상태 멤버 기준) (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ProjectMember pm2 WHERE pm2.project_id = p.project_id AND pm2.status = 'ACTIVE') AS memberCount FROM Project p INNER JOIN ProjectMember pm ON p.project_id = pm.project_id WHERE pm.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 'ACTIVE' AND p.deleted_at IS NULL AND pm.deleted_at IS NULL AND pm.status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY p.project_id DESC

SELECT p.project_id AS projectId, p.name, p.status, p.start_date AS startDate, p.end_date AS endDate, pm.is_favorite AS favorite, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Task t WHERE t.project_id = p.project_id AND t.deleted_at IS NULL) AS totalTaskCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Task t WHERE t.project_id = p.project_id AND t.status = 'DONE' AND t.deleted_at IS NULL) AS completedTaskCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Issue i WHERE i.project_id = p.project_id AND i.status != 'DONE') AS openIssueCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ProjectMember pm2 WHERE pm2.project_id = p.project_id AND pm2.status = 'ACTIVE') AS memberCount FROM Project p INNER JOIN ProjectMember pm ON p.project_id = pm.project_id WHERE pm.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 'DONE' AND p.deleted_at IS NULL AND pm.deleted_at IS NULL AND pm.status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY p.project_id DESC

SELECT p.project_id AS projectId, p.name, p.status, p.start_date AS startDate, p.end_date AS endDate, p.deleted_at AS deletedAt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Task t WHERE t.project_id = p.project_id AND t.deleted_at IS NULL) AS totalTaskCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Task t WHERE t.project_id = p.project_id AND t.status = 'DONE' AND t.deleted_at IS NULL) AS completedTaskCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Issue i WHERE i.project_id = p.project_id AND i.status != 'DONE') AS openIssueCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ProjectMember pm2 WHERE pm2.project_id = p.project_id AND pm2.status = 'ACTIVE') AS memberCount FROM Project p INNER JOIN ProjectMember pm ON p.project_id = pm.project_id WHERE pm.user_id = #{userId} AND p.deleted_at IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.deleted_at DESC
SELECT name FROM project WHERE project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT -- 1. 전체 업무 수 (삭제 안 된 것) (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Task WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND deleted_at IS NULL) AS totalTaskCount,
-- 2. 완료된 업무 수 (status가 DONE인 것) (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Task WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND status = 'DONE' AND deleted_at IS NULL) AS completedTaskCount,
-- 3. 진행 중인 업무 수 (IN_PROGRESS 상태만) (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Task WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND status = 'IN_PROGRESS' AND deleted_at IS NULL) AS inProgressTaskCount,
-- 4. 오픈 이슈 수 (상태가 DONE이 아닌 것) (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Issue WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND status != 'DONE' AND archived_at IS NULL) AS openIssueCount,
-- 5. 멤버 수 (초대된 사람 제외, 실제 활동 중인 사람) (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ProjectMember WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND status = 'ACTIVE' AND deleted_at IS NULL) AS memberCount
SELECT * FROM Project WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' AND deleted_at IS NULL AND DATE(end_date) = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
SELECT * FROM Project WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' AND deleted_at IS NULL AND end_date < NOW()
SELECT user_id FROM ProjectMember WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND status = 'ACTIVE' AND deleted_at IS NULL
